translation.indexText: And i'm a full stack developer using node-js
translation.about_01: My name is Flavio Esrenko Zorzeto, i'm a brazilian developer, passionate about programming, who started studying back-end developing APIs using node-js, developing and improving programming logic.
translation.about_02: And it's learning front-end to be even more a consistent full stack, where I develop web applications using the knowledge of HTML, CSS and JS together with React, Sass and styled-component, with the proposite of creating fluid, flexible and easy to maintain applications.
